trans-unit.source: Provides methods and attached properties that support data validation.
trans-unit.target: 提供方法和附加的屬性支援資料驗證。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed discussion of the validation process, see "Data Validation" in [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 驗證程序的詳細討論，請參閱 「 資料驗證 」，在[資料繫結概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Adds an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error> attached event to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 加入事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error>附加到指定的物件事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to add `handler` to.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to add `handler` to.

trans-unit.source: The handler to add.
Removes all <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref> objects from the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 移除所有<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref>從指定的物件<xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The `bindingExpression` object may have been invalid from a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.MarkInvalid%2A> call or a previously failed validation.
trans-unit.target: `bindingExpression`物件可能已從無效<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.MarkInvalid%2A>呼叫或先前失敗的驗證。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.MarkInvalid%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object is valid after this call.
trans-unit.target: 在這個呼叫之後，物件是有效的。

trans-unit.source: The object to turn valid.
If bindingExpression is .
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error> attached event.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors*> attached property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate*> attached property.
To be added.
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors*> attached property of the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 取得值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors*>附加屬性的指定項目。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to read the value from.
A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyObservableCollection%601> of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref> objects.
If element is .
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate*> attached property of the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 取得值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate*>附加屬性的指定項目。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to read the value from.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate"></xref> used to generate validation error feedback on the adorner layer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate"> </xref>用來產生裝飾項層上的驗證錯誤回應。

trans-unit.source: If element is .
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError*> attached property of the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 取得值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError*>附加屬性的指定項目。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to read the value from.
The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError*> attached property of the specified element.
If element is .
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*> attached property for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 取得值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*>附加指定的項目屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*>

trans-unit.source: The element from which to get the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*>.
The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*>.
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*> attached property for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 取得值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*>附加指定的項目屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*>

trans-unit.source: The element from which to get the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*>.
The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError*> attached property.
To be added.
Marks the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> object as invalid with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 標示指定<xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref>物件為具有指定的無效<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> object stays invalid until <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ClearInvalid%2A> is called or another transfer to the binding source validates successfully.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>物件維持無效直到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ClearInvalid%2A>稱為或另一個傳輸繫結來源的驗證成功。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ClearInvalid%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> object to mark as invalid.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref> object to use.
If validationError is .
Adds an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error> attached event from the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 加入事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error>從指定的物件附加事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to remove `handler` from.
The handler to remove.
Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate*> attached property to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 設定的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate*>附加屬性指定的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to set `value` on.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to set `value` on.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate"></xref> to use to generate validation error feedback on the adorner layer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate"> </xref>用於產生的裝飾項層上的驗證錯誤回應。

trans-unit.source: If element is .
Sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*> attached property to the specified value on the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*>附加至指定的值，指定的項目上的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*>

trans-unit.source: The element on which to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*> of the specified element.
Sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*> attached property to the specified value on the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*>附加至指定的值，指定的項目上的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*>

trans-unit.source: The element on which to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*> of the specified element.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*> attached property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*> attached property.
To be added.
